definition: A place where young children gather to engage in various educational and recreational activities under the supervision of trained professionals. It is typically used to refer to an institution or facility that provides early childhood education and care for children before they start formal schooling.

examples.german: Der Kindergarten ist voll von spielenden Kindern.
examples.english: The kindergarten is full of playing children.

examples.german: Mein Kind geht in den Kindergarten.

examples.english: The kindergarten children paint colorful pictures.
